"Xiera": "<red>Using a Normal Attack gives a period of invincibility<c>, while <red>using a Weapon Action will put up your guard while you attack<c>. Choose which you want to use depending on the situation."
"The appeal of Etoile Double Saber is how easily and flexibly it adapts to fit your fighting style."
"Finally, let's review what you've learned with some practical training!"
